data.Sentence_cn: 黛比.哈特准备明天横渡英吉利海峡。
data.Sentence: Debbie Hart is going to swim across the English Channel tomorrow.

data.Sentence_cn: 她打算早上5点钟从法国海岸出发。
data.Sentence: She is going to set out from the French coast at five o'clock in the morning.

data.Sentence_cn: 黛比只有11岁，她希望创一项新的世界纪录。
data.Sentence: Debbie is only eleven years old and she hopes to set up a new world record.

data.Sentence_cn: 她是一个游泳能手，很多人认为她一定能成功。
data.Sentence: She is a strong swimmer and many people feel that she is sure to succeed.

data.Sentence_cn: 黛比的父亲将乘一条小船同她一道出发。
data.Sentence: Debbie's father will set out with her in a small boat.

data.Sentence_cn: 哈特先生训练她的女儿已经多年了，
data.Sentence: Mr.Hart has trained his daughter for years.

data.Sentence_cn: 明天他将焦急地注视着女儿游过这段漫长的距离到达英国。
data.Sentence: Tomorrow he will be watching her anxiously as she swims the long distance to England.

data.Sentence_cn: 黛比计划每两小时休息一下。
data.Sentence: Debbie intends to take short rests every two hours.

data.Sentence_cn: 她将喝些饮料，但不吃固体食物。
data.Sentence: She will have something to drink but she will not eat any solid food.

data.Sentence_cn: 黛比的大部分同学将在英国海岸等候她。
data.Sentence: Most of Debbie's school friends will be waiting for her on the English coast.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们当中还会有黛比的母亲，她本人还是个姑娘时，也曾横渡过英吉利海峡！
data.Sentence: Among them will be Debbie's mother, who swam the Channel herself when she was a girl.
